gobblin.runtime.cli

Class PublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.cli.PublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CliObjectFactory<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstructorAndPublicMethodsCliObjectFactory

    public abstract class PublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>
extends Object
implements CliObjectFactory<T>
    A helper class for automatically inferring Options from the public methods in a class. For each public method in the class to infer with exactly zero or one String parameter, the helper will create an optional Option. Using the annotation CliObjectOption the helper can automatically add a description to the Option. Annotating a method with NotOnCli will prevent the helper from creating an Option from it.

      • buildObject

        public T buildObject(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cli)
        Description copied from interface: CliObjectFactory
        Build an instance of T from the parsed CommandLine. The input CommandLine was parsed with the output of Options, but may include additional Options added by the driver.
        Specified by:
        buildObject in interface CliObjectFactory<T>

        public T buildObject(String[] args,
                     int offset,
                     boolean printUsage,
                     String usage)
              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: CliObjectFactory
        Build an instance of T from the input arguments.
        Specified by:
        buildObject in interface CliObjectFactory<T>
        Parameters:
        args - input arguments to the application.
        offset - will only start processing from this argument number.
        printUsage - if true, a failure or -h will cause help to be printed and an exception to be thrown.
        usage - usage String to be printed at the beginning of help message.

      • getUsageString

        public String getUsageString()
        Description copied from interface: CliObjectFactory
        Get a usage string for display on the command line. The output of this method will be appended to the base string "gobblin run ". This should specify required options or parameters.
        Specified by:
        getUsageString in interface CliObjectFactory<T>

      • applyCommandLineOptions

        public void applyCommandLineOptions(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cli,
                                    T embeddedGobblin)
        For each method for which the helper created an Option and for which the input CommandLine contains that option, this method will automatically call the method on the input object with the correct arguments.
